articles.author: Eli Stokols, Clea Caulcutt
articles.title: After Greenland, it’s the micro-agressions - Politico
articles.description: President Trump has backed off his threats toward Denmark's territorial sovereignty, but he and aides have continued to irritate much of Europe.
articles.content:
Amid the row over Greenland last month, Trump casually dismissed the sacrifice
 of NATO troops who fought beside U.S. forces in Afghanistan, leaving NATO allies disgusted. Subsequently, the U.S. emb… [+6465 chars]
